Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan® Dried Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with Ceftaroline (0.06-16 mcg/ml)
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive bacteria
Staphylococcus aureus (skin isolates and community-acquired bacterial pneumonia isolates)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Siemens MicroScan Dried Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with added Ceftaroline for antimicrobial susceptibility testing of gram-positive bacteria.
Indications for Use Summary: Used to determine antimicrobial agent susceptibility for colonies of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive bacteria, specifically for Ceftaroline susceptibility in Staphylococcus aureus skin and community-acquired pneumonia isolates.
